content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <source name="britishPostalMuseum" active="true"  type="solr"  uri="http://data.archiveshub.ac.uk:8083/solr/britishPostalMuseum/select/"  logo="http://assets1.postalheritage.org.uk/imgs/logo.png"  mediaLocation="http://catalogue.postalheritage.org.uk/dserve/dserve.exe?dsqServer=localhost&dsqIni=Dserve.ini&dsqApp=Archive&dsqCmd=Image.tcl&dsqDb=Catalog&dsqImage=">   <results>     <insert result_field="dc.type">Record</insert>     <!--legacy-->     <mappings result_field="dc.Title" source_field="Title" legacy_instead_use="dc.title"/>     <mappings result_field="dc.Description" source_field="Description" legacy_instead_use="dc.description"/>     <mappings result_field="disco.previewMediaAbsolutePath" source_field="Thumbnail" legacy_instead_use="JISCDiscovery.previewMediaAbsolutePath">       <sanitises prepend="http://catalogue.postalheritage.org.uk/dserve/dserve.exe?dsqServer=localhost&dsqIni=Dserve.ini&dsqApp=Archive&dsqCmd=Image.tcl&dsqDb=Catalog&dsqImage="/>     </mappings>      <mappings result_field="disco.previewMediaAbsolutePath" source_field="Thumbnail2" legacy_instead_use="JISCDiscovery.previewMediaAbsolutePath">       <sanitises prepend="http://catalogue.postalheritage.org.uk/dserve/dserve.exe?dsqServer=localhost&dsqIni=Dserve.ini&dsqApp=Archive&dsqCmd=Image.tcl&dsqDb=Catalog&dsqImage="/>     </mappings>      <mappings result_field="disco.previewMediaRelativePath" source_field="Thumbnail" legacy_instead_use="JISCDiscovery.previewMediaAbsolutePath"/>     <mappings result_field="disco.previewMediaRelativePath" source_field="Thumbnail2" legacy_instead_use="JISCDiscovery.previewMediaAbsolutePath"/>      <!--dc-->     <mappings result_field="dc.coverage" source_field="Memorial Campaigns"/>     <mappings result_field="dc.description" source_field="Description"/>     <mappings result_field="dc.identifier" source_field="RefNo"/>     <mappings result_field="dc.title" source_field="Title"/>     <!--dcterms nonliteral-->     <mappings result_field="dcterms.extent" source_field="Dimensions"/>      <mappings result_field="dcterms.medium" source_field="Materials"/>     <mappings result_field="dcterms.relation" source_field="RefNo">       <sanitises prepend="http://catalogue.postalheritage.org.uk/dserve/dserve.exe?dsqServer=localhost&dsqIni=Dserve.ini&dsqApp=Archive&dsqCmd=Show.tcl&dsqDb=Catalog&dsqPos=0&dsqSearch=%28%28text%29%3D%27" append="%27%29"/>     </mappings>     <!-- JISC Discovery -->     <mappings result_field="JISCDiscovery.previewMediaAbsolutePath" source_field="Thumbnail">       <sanitises prepend="http://catalogue.postalheritage.org.uk/dserve/dserve.exe?dsqServer=localhost&dsqIni=Dserve.ini&dsqApp=Archive&dsqCmd=Image.tcl&dsqDb=Catalog&dsqImage="/>     </mappings>      <mappings result_field="JISCDiscovery.previewMediaAbsolutePath" source_field="Thumbnail2">       <sanitises prepend="http://catalogue.postalheritage.org.uk/dserve/dserve.exe?dsqServer=localhost&dsqIni=Dserve.ini&dsqApp=Archive&dsqCmd=Image.tcl&dsqDb=Catalog&dsqImage="/>     </mappings>      <!--internal-->      <!--possibly useful-->     <known_fields name="Access Conditions"/>     <known_fields name="Repository"/>    </results> </source>
